data.comment: The match is underway in Nice.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 2, Benjamin Andre of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 5, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 9, Lille to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Free kick Lille.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 10, Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Dante (Nice) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 12, Nice push forward at Allianz Rivera and Hassane Kamara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lille defence.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Nice drives forward and Morgan Schneiderlin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 13, Nice push upfield but Frank Schneider quickly pulls them for offside.
Lille's Luiz Araujo breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 17, Lille's Jonathan Ikone is whistled for offside at Allianz Rivera.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 24, Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Nice.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Lille.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Nice in the half of Lille.
Frank Schneider awards Lille a goal kick.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Lille drive forward but Burak Yilmaz is judged offside.
Free kick Nice.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 33, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Nice.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Lille are coming forward and Burak Yilmaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 43, Jonathan Bamba of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Frank Schneider awards Nice a goal kick.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 43, Lille's Botman Sven has been booked in Nice.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Nice have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
The first-half has come to a close in Nice.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Lille.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Lille.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Nice take a 1-0 lead thanks to Kasper Dolberg.
In the minute 50, Alexis Claude-Maurice instrumental with a fine assist.
Lille's Renato Sanches gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nice defender.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Nice.
In the minute 52, Frank Schneider signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Nice's area.
Free kick Lille.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 55, Free kick Lille.
Frank Schneider signals a Lille throw-in in Nice's half.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 57, Frank Schneider awards the home team a throw-in.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Burak Yilmaz.
In the minute 58, Great play from Luiz Araujo to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Lille at Allianz Rivera.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a first substitution, with Yusuf Yazici replacing Jonathan Ikone.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Luiz Araujo (Lille) has received a yellow card from Frank Schneider.
In the minute 65, Frank Schneider signals a Nice throw-in in Lille's half.
Frank Schneider awards Lille a goal kick.
Patrick Vieira is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Rivera with Amine Gouiri replacing Rony Lopes.
In the minute 69, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Burak Yilmaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lille.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nice to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Nice have a goal kick.
Youcef Atal is on a sub for Jordan Lotomba for Nice.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Pierre Lees-Melou with Kephren Thuram Ulien. This is the third substitution made today by Patrick Vieira.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 75, Zeki Celik (Lille) gets a yellow card.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 78, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Burak Yilmaz (Lille) has received a first yellow card.
Jonathan David is replacing Burak Yilmaz for the away team.
In the minute 79, Lille make their third substitution with Xeka replacing Renato Sanches.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Kasper Dolberg with Hicham Boudaoui.
In the minute 81, Jeff Reine-Adelaide is replacing Alexis Claude-Maurice for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Nice.
In the minute 84, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice just outside Lille's area.
Jose Fonte for Lille has been booked by Frank Schneider and receives a first yellow card.
In Nice, Kephren Thuram Ulien (Nice) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Lille.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Isaac Lihadji is replacing Luiz Araujo for the away team.
Christophe Galtier is making the team's fifth substitution at Allianz Rivera with Boubakary Soumare replacing Benjamin Andre.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 89, At Allianz Rivera, Mike Maignan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Amine Gouiri for Nice is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Nice.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Nice. The final score is 1-1.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Amine Gouiri.
